bgeu.description: Branch Greater Than or Equal Unsigned

csrrw.description: Atomic Read and Write of CSR

csrrs.description: Atomic Read and Set of CSR Bits

csrrc.description: Atomic Read and Clear of CSR Bits

csrrwi.description: Atomic Read and Write of CSR with Immediate

csrrsi.description: Atomic Read and Set of CSR Bits with Immediate

csrrci.description: Atomic Read and Clear of CSR Bits with Immediate

mulw.pseudocode: rd = rs1 * rs2 (signed 64x64-bit multiplication, result stored in 64-bit rd)

divw.pseudocode: rd = rs1 / rs2 (signed 64/64-bit division, quotient stored in 64-bit rd)

divuw.pseudocode: rd = rs1 / rs2 (unsigned 64/64-bit division, quotient stored in 64-bit rd)

remw.pseudocode: rd = rs1 % rs2 (signed 64/64-bit remainder, result stored in 64-bit rd)

remuw.pseudocode: rd = rs1 % rs2 (unsigned 64/64-bit remainder, result stored in 64-bit rd)

lr_w.pseudocode: rd = M[rs1]; if aq then aq = 0; if rl then rl = 0;

sc_w.pseudocode: rd = M[rs1]; if aq then aq = 0; if rl then rl = 0; if successful SC, rd = 0; else rd = 1;

amoswap_w.pseudocode: rd = M[rs1]; if aq then aq = 0; if rl then rl = 0; M[rs1] = rs2;

sc_d.pseudocode: if (Memory[rs1] == rd) { Memory[rs1] = rs2; rd = 1; } else rd = 0;

fsgnj_s.pseudocode: f(rd) = f(rs1) with sign of f(rs2);

fsgnjn_s.description: Floating-Point Sign Inject Negate Single Precision

fsgnjx_s.pseudocode: f(rd) = f(rs1) with sign of f(rs2), and value of abs(f(rs1));
fsgnjx_s.description: Floating-Point Sign Inject with Exchange Single Precision

fcvt_w_s.description: Floating-Point Convert to Signed Word Single Precision

fcvt_wu_s.description: Floating-Point Convert to Unsigned Word Single Precision

fmv_x_w.description: Floating-Point Move to Integer Register Single Precision

fle_s.description: Floating-Point Less Than or Equal Single Precision

fcvt_s_wu.description: Floating-Point Convert to Unsigned Word Single Precision

fmv_w_x.description: Floating-Point Move to Integer Register Single Precision

fcvt_l_s.description: Floating-Point Convert to Signed Long Double Precision

fcvt_lu_s.description: Floating-Point Convert to Unsigned Long Double Precision

fcvt_s_l.description: Floating-Point Convert to Single Precision from Long Double Precision

fcvt_s_lu.description: Floating-Point Convert to Single Precision from Unsigned Long Double Precision

fcvt_s_d.description: Floating-Point Convert to Single Precision from Double Precision

fcvt_d_s.description: Floating-Point Convert to Double Precision from Single Precision

fle_d.description: Floating-Point Less Than or Equal Double Precision

fcvt_w_d.description: Floating-Point Convert to Signed Word Double Precision

fcvt_wu_d.description: Floating-Point Convert to Unsigned Word Double Precision

fcvt_d_w.description: Floating-Point Convert to Double Precision from Signed Word

fcvt_d_wu.description: Floating-Point Convert to Double Precision from Unsigned Word

fcvt_l_d.description: Floating-Point Convert to Signed Long Double Precision

fcvt_lu_d.description: Floating-Point Convert to Unsigned Long Double Precision

fcvt_d_l.description: Floating-Point Convert to Double Precision from Signed Long

c_beqz.description: Compressed Branch if Equal to Zero

c_bnez.description: Compressed Branch if Not Equal to Zero
